[barf](../../../README.md) / [core/batch](../README.md) / LoopMode

# Type Alias: LoopMode

> **LoopMode** = `"plan"` \| `"build"` \| `"split"`

Defined in: src/core/batch.ts:23

The mode passed to `runLoop`. `'split'` is used internally after an overflow decision.
